creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: rectangular box with intricately painted tiny images of people gathered along a riverbank and over a bridge with umbrellas on the cover; street scenes on the long sides with people walking in front of buildings; interior scene of people sitting inside verandahs on short sides; dense foliage images with butterflies inside
medium: Satsuma ware; porcelain with overglaze enamels and gold
title: Box with genre scenes
